ComicInfo.Summary: The Four break Knightsabre out of prison leading to a fight with Youngblood. Lord Dredd and Jeriko meet in the park they hint at a shared past and at things to come. The last few pages of this comic set the stage for the Youngblood and X-Force crossover.
